name: pony bead weighted blanket
sizes_available: xxs, xs, s, m, l, xl, xxl
notes:
learn how to add pony beads to your crocheting to make an easy weighted blanket in any size! the best part? there's no need to pre-string the beads. you pick them up as you work.

this technique is also a fun way to add texture to your crocheted bags, pillows and baskets.

consider this a "recipe" for crocheting a weighted blanket. in the easy-to-follow pattern and tutorial, you'll find information on how to make afghans in several sizes, but i also cover how to easily calculate the weight of your own design.

use this info to make a heavy blanket that suits your exact needs!

this ad-free, printable pdf includes a written pattern in 7 blanket sizes (1.5-11 pounds). you'll also find a step-by-step photo tutorial and link to a video tutorial.

find more of our favorite [crochet blanket patterns][1] here. 


  [1]: https://makeanddocrew.com/crochet-blanket-patterns/
